text: The RT-20Phttps://www.globalsecurity.org/wmd/world/russia/rt-20p.htm?ezoic_amp=1 was an intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) developed but not deployed by the Soviet Union during the Cold War. The control system for it was designed at NPO "Electropribor"Krivonosov, Khartron: Computers for rocket guidance systems (Kharkiv, Ukraine). It was assigned the NATO reporting name SS-15 Scrooge and carried the GRAU index 8K99. The RT-20 was the first mobile ICBM designed by the Soviet Union. SS-15. UK MoD Defence Intelligence drawing. ==Operator== ;: The Strategic Rocket Forces was the only operator of the RT-20. ==Gallery== File:Defe44-163-SS-15-Scrooge-stitched.jpg|UK MoD Defence Intelligence assessment. Complete report montaged.
